ygData.msgSnippet: Rion turned to face the cat/bird bot beside him. She knew his name. She knew his name! Only one other bot on this entire planet would know who he was!

Rion turned to face the cat/bird 'bot beside him. She knew his name. She 
knew his name! Only one other 'bot on this entire planet would know who he 
was! Still... he couldn't take any chances. It could be a trick.

Rion sheathed his sword, which oddly enough he hadn't dropped once during 
the entire vulture incident. He must be getting better, or maybe he was just 
lucky. Either way, Rion cleared his throat and straigtened his back. He used 
his most adult sounding voice. Unfortunetly he was only seven, so he didn't 
sound as professional and intimidating as he would have liked:

"Who wants to know?"
